title: Bog Blueberry (Vaccinium uliginosum)
name: bog blueberry
rationale: LightGBM provided the best quantitative performance.
description: The bog blueberry diagnostic species set consists only of Vaccinium uliginosum L. Vaccinium uliginosum is common and widespread throughout the map domain. It can achieve high abundance as the canopy or in a sub-canopy stratum with highly flexible habitat preferences.
